pageContent: Military Microwave Weapons Used on U.S. Civilians: Our Main Message: 1) Thousands of people in the U.S., are being attacked with High-Powered Microwave (HPM) weapons, from satellites and cell towers. These weapons are controlled from Schriever Air Force Base in Colorado. See our pictures of microwave burns as proof: https://www.targetedjustice.com/microwave-burns1.html This is the same weapon system, that was used on the U.S. Diplomats in Cuba. 2) Most people in the world, are being precisely tracked by microwave pulses from Lockheed GPS satellites, operated by the U.S. Space Force, Squadron 2, at Schriever Air Force Base. (No, this is not Russia or China. It is funded and controlled by the CIA.) 3) Panel antennas on cell towers are part of a "global distributed weapon system." The antennas use digital beamforming to create microwave "bullets," that can be very painful, and even deadly. 4) Subliminal messages are directed through Cell Towers, at everyone, 24/7. Schriever AFB is the source. U.S. Patent 4,877,027. Senators, Congressmen, Judges, and even the President, are being hit with specific subliminal messages to affect their decisions. 5) The CIA controls and funds this illegal program, under the Council on Foreign Relations (CFR). The program is based on MK-Ultra mind control technology, and the FBI's illegal COINTELPRO. 6) Latest Videos from Targeted Justice: https://odysee.com/@shadowcitizen:d/targetjustice:3 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zNDswN3nnIA TargetedJustice.com Flyer TJ-24Jun2021 TJlawsuit@use.startmail.com
